original_title: 5000 Years of Magnificent Wonders: Ancient Egypt
overview: Using animated reconstructions, location footage and stunning photography, this absorbing video transports viewers to Egypt to explore some magnificent ancient landmarks. Stops on the itinerary include the Valley of the Kings, the Great Sphinx, the Al Karnak temple complex, the mortuary shrine of Hatshepsut and other monuments of antiquity. Leading historians discuss the advanced construction methods used to erect the architectural wonders.
title: 5000 Years of Magnificent Wonders: Ancient Egypt
